doc:
Hugh Reilly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_Reilly 0 Hugh Reilly (October 30, 1915 – July 17, 1998) was an American actor who performed on the Broadway stage, in films, and on television. He is best remembered for co-starring from 1958 to 1964 as the father, Paul Martin, in the CBS television series, Lassie. Hugh_Reilly ( October_30_,_1915 – July_17_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor who performed on the_Broadway_stage , in films , and on television . He is_best_remembered for co-starring from 1958 to 1964 as the_father , Paul_Martin , in the_CBS_television_series , Lassie .
